November 1: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
November 2: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
November 3: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
November 4: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
November 5: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
November 6: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
November 7: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
November 8: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
November 9: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
November 10: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
November 11: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
November 12: It always seems impossible until it's done.
November 13: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
November 14: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
November 15: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
November 16: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
November 17: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
November 18: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
November 19: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
November 20: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
November 21: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
November 22: You are the only one who can limit your greatness.
November 23: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
November 24: The key to success is to start before you are ready.
November 25: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
November 26: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
November 27: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
November 28: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
November 29: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
November 30: It always seems impossible until it's done.
